wrote:
> I am Doug, I lived in Japan for about 3 years and loved it, I had 
many friends there and learned a lot. But it has been many, many years. 
But Michael, I will try to help you, if I can. OK. I may take me 
sometime to get organized.
> 
> Michael <deathbeads@y...> wrote: I am new to the group and i am glad 
i found you. I am a student of 
> Japanese history samurai in particular and it is hard to find factual 
> info on the net.
> 

www.Samurai-archives.com is the best place to start for this. 

Maikeru
